subject: Negotiation
title: Elon Musk's Twitter Takeover Drama
description: A fast breakdown of Elon Musk's Twitter Takeover Drama for builders.

hook.text: Elon Musk offered $44 billion for Twitter, tried to back out, then was forced to complete the deal.

buildup.text: Musk made the offer, waived due diligence, then claimed Twitter had more bots than disclosed.

discovery.text: By waiving due diligence, Musk gave up his strongest legal tool to renegotiate or exit.

twist.text: Twitter sued to enforce the deal. The contract left Musk with almost no legal escape route.
